      • flushRotatedLogs

        public void flushRotatedLogs()
                      throws java.io.IOException
        if disk of the logChannel is full or if the entrylog limit is reached of if the logchannel is not initialized, then createNewLog. If allDisks are full then proceed with the current logChannel, since Bookie must have turned to readonly mode and the addEntry traffic would be from GC and it is ok to proceed in this case.
        Specified by:
        flushRotatedLogs in class EntryLogManagerBase
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
